sentences.en: Anyone looking for a dynamic doer who run the show will gravitate to your side.
sentences.cn: 任何寻找积极实干家的人都会投你一票.

sentences.en: Boys gravitate towards girls at that age.
sentences.cn: 男孩们被大门口的女孩们吸引了.

sentences.en: Children gravitate toward home at dusk.
sentences.cn: 黄昏时,小孩就自然地回家.

sentences.en: Don't gravitate to one side, or the boat will upset.
sentences.cn: 别都移向一边, 否则船会翻的.

sentences.en: Families with children , for instance, tend to'gravitate toward families with children.
sentences.cn: 比如,有小孩的家庭, 易于彼此吸引靠拢.

sentences.en: If you all gravitate to one side, you'll upset the boat.
sentences.cn: 如果大家都移向一边, 船就要翻了.

sentences.en: Let your soul gravitate, to the love!
sentences.cn: 让你的灵魂指引你怎样去爱!

sentences.en: Most visitors to New York gravitate to Times Square.
sentences.cn: 大多数来纽约的游客都被吸引到时代广场.

sentences.en: My excuse must be that all Celts gravitate towards each other ( Oscar Wilde )
sentences.cn: 我的藉口一定是所有的凯尔特人都相互吸引 ( 奥斯卡·怀尔德 )

sentences.en: Naturally artistic, these folks also gravitate toward jobs involving design, music, or dance.
sentences.cn: 优雅世艺术的气质使他们很适合从事设计 、 音乐和舞蹈方面的工作.

sentences.en: See how the color wands gravitate towards the bottom right corner?
sentences.cn: 看见绿色波纹向右上角倾斜了 吗 ?

sentences.en: Some players just gravitate towards certain mechanics and find others bland or frustrating.
sentences.cn: 有的玩家只是侧重于某一机制,对别的机制感觉没意思或者太困难.

sentences.en: Some SAD sufferers, he says, simply gravitate toward a lifestyle that accommodates the disease.
sentences.cn: 他说, 有些周期性情感失调症患者, 倾向于一种易于滋生这种病的生活方式.

sentences.en: The stars gravitate towards each other.
You naturally gravitate toward people with shared values.
sentences.cn: 你自然而然地被具有共同价值观的人吸引。

words.tran_cn: [力] 重力的，[力] 引力的
受重力作用的；万有引力的
重力；万有引力；地心吸力
[相对][高能] 引力子；万有吸引力
重力，地心引力；严重性；庄严

trans.tran_en: to be attracted to something and therefore move towards it or become involved with it
to be attracted to something and therefore move towards it or become involved with it
